introduction.title: Hi~ I'm Coco, currently have 2 years of experience in Web backend and frontend development.
introduction.item2: ✔️ Fast learner, love to learn new technologies

experience2.title: Software Engineer (Developer)
experience2.desc1: Collaborated with project managers and UI/UX designers to understand product requirements and estimate project timelines and milestones.
experience2.desc2: Designed and developed both front-end and back-end systems, using a decoupled architecture.
experience2.desc3: Back-end: Primarily utilized Quarkus and Kotlin. Built microservices-based systems and deployed them on GKE using Cloud Build CI/CD for automated deployment.
experience2.desc4: Front-end: Primarily utilized Vue 3. Implemented automated deployment through Github Actions.

project01.title: Intelligent Scheduling System
project01.desc: Personalized learning platform with Line notifications for parents. Automated quizzes boost learning outcomes.

project02.title: AI English Speaking Material
project02.desc: AI-powered pronunciation scoring and feedback enhance oral learning.

project03.title: URL Shortener
project03.desc: User-friendly platform for creating and managing custom short URLs with click analytics.
